features: Simple Water Boost Hydrating Gel Cream restores hydration to dehydrated skin, leaving it feeling refreshed, supple and comfortable.
Smooths away tightness and dryness while providing long-lasting hydration.
Does not leave skin feeling greasy or sticky.
Lightweight gel formulation glides onto skin, leaving it feeling refreshed, supple, silky and smooth.

Infused with minerals and a plant extract, our formula instantly hydrates your skin..As per all our Simple products, Simple Water Boost Hydrating Gel Cream contains no harsh chemicals, artificial colors or perfume, making it perfectly suitable for dehydrated, dry or sensitive skin.
body.description: Intense hydration does not have to mean greasy or sticky! Simple Water Boost Hydrating Gel Cream’s ultra-light and refreshing formula works throughout the day, to deliver instant, continuous hydration, leaving skin smooth and dewy fresh. Made with skin-loving ingredients, minerals and a plant extract and no harsh chemicals, it’s perfect for sensitive, dry or dehydrated skin.Simple Water Boost Hydrating Gel Cream is part of the new Simple Water Boost skincare range infused with minerals and a plant extract and dedicated to reversing the 5 early symptoms of dehydration: dryness, roughness, feelings of tightness, dullness and dry dehydration lines. Skin is left feeling revitalized, supple and dewy-fresh. Our products contain no harsh chemicals, artificial colors or perfume that can upset your skin, making it perfect for even sensitive skin.Your skin continually works to maintain hydration levels to keep your skin in its best condition. Factors such as air pollution, weather, temperature changes, air conditioning, stress and lack of sleep can cause your natural hydration cycle to get out of balance and as a result, skin can become dry and dehydrated. Why not try out our other products in the Simple Water Boost range to instantly hydrate your skin? For best results, we recommend cleansing with a Simple Water Boost cleanser, then applying a few drops of Simple Water Boost Hydrating Booster all over your face, to prep your skin to absorb moisture and help it stay hydrated for longer. Finish by applying Simple Hydrating Gel Cream to complete your hydration skincare routine.Proven by clinicals and consumers to:- 90% agree that skin looks and feels revitalized after using our Hydrating Gel Cream.- 85% agree that our Hydrating Gel Cream restores comfort and suppleness to skin- 83% agree that after using our Hydrating Gel Cream, skin is fully hydrated

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Simple Water Boost Hydrating Gel Cream, Face Moisturizer, 1.7 oz This hydrating gel facial cream is one of our best face moisturizers to smoothe away tightness and dryness. Simple Water Boost Hydrating Gel Cream’s ultra-light and refreshing formula works throughout the day, to deliver instant, continuous hydration, leaving skin smooth and dewy fresh. It delivers instant moisture to thirsty skin, reversing dehydration symptoms such as dry or dull-looking skin and leaving it looking and feeling smooth and revitalised. Made with skin-loving ingredients, minerals and a plant extract, it’s perfect for sensitive, dry or dehydrated skin. Our Water Boost Hydrating Gel Cream contains no harsh chemicals, artificial color or perfume that can upset your skin, making it perfect for even sensitive skin.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 15, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Extremely good and simple. Totally recommend for troubled skin.
reviews.reviewText: Really nice product. Rubs in smooth, absorbs well. No pilling when applied over other products.My moisture barrier was a bit messed up from too many exfoliating products and was very sensitive. This didn't sting (my other ones burned a bit, my skin was that compromised) and was very soothing. My skin didn't dry out for the rest of the day. No annoying scent.I will definitely use this going forward in my routines, especially when my skin acts up.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This is a good product if you're not a huge fan of the super oily feeling lotions, dries pretty fast and keeps face soft !

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars It's a good lightweight moisturizer for sensitive skin, but not as good as the old one
reviews.reviewText: I bought this because they stopped making the old "Simple Lightweight Moisturizer", in the white pump bottle with the green cap. That stuff was my go-to daily face moisturizer. This is good, but it's not quite the same.What I liked about the old Lightweight Moisturizer was that it seemed to absorb almost instantly and felt like nothing on my skin, but noticeably improved moisture/softness. This one still works in the moisture department, but it feels somehow more artificial. It's hard to describe, but it feels more like "I put something on my skin to make it smooth" vs "my skin is just magically smoother".Anyway, it still works as a moisturizer, and it doesn't give me any bad reactions, so that's good. I just wish they would bring back the old stuff.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 4, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This is really nice stuff. Very light. Does not clog pores. Absorbs very quickly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 17, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love This Moisturizer!
reviews.reviewText: I have been using Simple products for as long as I can remember. I love Simple products because they work really well for my dry sensitive skin. I've always used their Replenishing Rich Moisturizer, but I was developing some dry patches on my face that would not go away and I was looking for something more to help with that. When I saw that Simple had come out with the Water Boost Hydrating Gel Cream Face Moisturizer and saw that it was made for dry dehydrated skin I bought it right away. A few minutes after I applied it to my face I could really notice a difference! My skin felt soft and smooth, especially where the dry patches were, and it even looked better too! I've been using it now for about a week and a half and my dry patches have gone away! The only downfall is that it comes in a small tube. I wish they would come out with a bigger size, but other than that I absolutely love this moisturizer and would recommend it to anyone with dry/dehydrated/sensitive skin! I also use this product along with the Simple Water Boost Micellar Face wash, and at night I use the Simple Water Boost Skin Quench Sleeping Cream.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 2, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Feels lovely, not greasy, allergic reactions to something.
reviews.reviewText: I bought this because of the name, Simple, the ingredient list appeared clean and great for sensitive skin, and the price point, it seemed like a great substitute for Neutrogena gel that was on backorder. I added it to my skin care regimen as soon as it arrived. Within a few days, I developed an angry inflammed pore at the side of my mouth that grew to the size of a walnut. It took 2 weeks to settle down, an left a scar. I am over 50 and have never had any type of acne scars, so this was alarming. I didn't initially attribute it to the Simple produce, just figured I had maybe done something wrong when exfoliating.The same thing happened to the right side of my upper lip a couple of weeks ago, this time involving 2 pores, and took another 3 weeks to heal, there is still a hard lump of something under my skin and a scar forming. The day I stopped using the Simple moisturizer, my pores started to look and feel better. Could be that the moisturizer is expired- I saw that it was discontinued in 2020, or could be that I am allergic to one or more of the ingredients, but it can be hazardous to open pores I guess. I discarded the remainder of the Simple moisturizer and decided I will go back to tried and true Aveeno- not even sure about trusting any other water based moisturizers.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 25, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on June 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Just as good as the expensive brands .....
reviews.reviewText: .. very light .. not greasy .. almost like a gel .. no scent ... been using it for years all the way back to when it was shipped from England.

Light gel moisturizer which is good for oily skin. Best for the summer and as your daytime moisturizer. It sinks into your skin quickly and doesn’t leave you feeling greasy. But there’s nothing special about it.
Amazing price and fast delivery from Amazon Prime! Price is significantly cheaper then pharmacies like Guardian or Watsons. What’s more, the expiry date is quite far off! Good deal.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on December 3, 2021
reviews.reviewText: It has taken me way too long to fine the right moisturiser for my dry sensitive skin but finally with this one from Simple, it works so well and I have not had any problems with it (so far) and I have been using it for a while. I used to get dry patches on my skin and reactions to perfumed moisturisers, however with this one my skin has been great, with no reactions, no dry patches and it goes well under makeup. So for anyone who has dry sensitive skin, I would very much recommend you try this one!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on February 2, 2022
reviews.reviewText: It has a nice texture an hydrates my skin very well but weirdly it irritated my skin a few times.. quite unusual as this is a brand for sensitive skin. Also try a different moisturiser for your T zone as this will make it oily (for combo skin)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on August 17, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: Great face cream- one of my favourites.
reviews.reviewText: I really like this face cream, it is water based and hydrates my face much better than other creams. It has no scent which is perfect for my sensitive skin and feels lightweight. It doesn’t have any spf in it as far as I know, so I do use a separate spf on top, but it’s the best face cream I’ve ever tried.
